utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, my name’s Chandler. I just moved in next door and I was wondering if you would be interested in battling me in a post-apoplectic world for control of the galaxies last remaining energy source?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, neighbor come on in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, is Janine around?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, no, she’s at dance class.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can I check out what she did to my room?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, but, hey look, don’t go through her stuff. She gets really mad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God. What is th… it’s like a guy never lived in here. Look, you’ve got to be careful. This girl thing is dangerous. It’s spreading already.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It is???

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, is this your pretty pink pillow on the couch?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that your tiny little box, that’s too small to put anything in?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! Ok, this is not good. You are a guy. Ok? This is a guys place. If you let this go, you’re going to be sitting around with your fingers soaking in stuff.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, you’re right. I’ll talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes talk to her. Be a man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m a man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Defend yourself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler come on. We have to hem the new dust ruffle.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Be right there sweetums. A totally different situation.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, how was your breakfast with Hillary?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was okay. She’s still kind of depressed because she broke up with her boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, is this Hillary your HOT assistant chef Hillary?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The one that always stares at me when I come in?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, the one who looked at you once because you got in her way.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still I could tell. She was into me. Well, why don’t you set us up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, are you setting Ross up with someone? Does she have a wedding dress?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m, uhh, making up flyers trying to get new massage clients. So, can I come to Bloomingdale’s and use the copy machine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, sure, but they might think it’s kinda weird considering I don’t work there anymore.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God. What happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I, got a job at Ralph Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well that’s great! Congratulations!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. A year ago..

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’ve lasted a whole year. Good for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But, Pheebs, you can still use the copy machine where I actually work. But, just come by at lunch so my boss doesn’t see you. Cause Kim will just freak out and she already doesn’t like me very much.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s weird. I don’t think my boss likes me either.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t think mine likes me either.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe it’s a universal thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Or maybe, it’s because you’re hanging around here at 11:30 on a Wednesday.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah let’s head off to work.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We should go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now you will not believe this. But, I was in the copy room, making copies, and Ralph Lauren came in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. Did you talk to him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah a little. He seems really nice. Good kisser.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What!?! You kissed him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Totally.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. I was just in there. He introduced himself and the next thing I know, we’re making out. You know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, I mean, you do know he’s married?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What am I supposed to do? Ask every guy I make out with if he’s married? No, yeah, I should.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hey Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. Uh, can I talk to you for a second? This, uh, kid in this picture. Do you, uh, know this kid? Is that like a relative or something?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: No, I just thought it was cute.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s what I was afraid of.. Okay, uhh…Look Janine I really want you to feel at home here, but some of this new stuff. It’s…too girly.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Ohh. Like what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Like this. Pictures of cute babies we don’t know. We..we can’t have that.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Joey, it’s Anne Geddes. She’s a famous artist.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look I don’t know this baby. I don’t know if she’s a famous artist or not. You know, and I don’t want to be a jerk but you’re changing too much around here.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well, I’m sorry. I just thought I’d try to make the place a little nicer.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah but it’s too much stuff. You know like, you got the candles and the foofy schmoofer thing here and over here you got a picture of a watering can.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well I just thought…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sure it’s a famous watering can, okay. But, come on…and what is with the really hot stick in the bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: It’s a curling iron.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, well, that’s ok then. But, okay my towels for instance. I come in to the bathroom here and my towel is not on the floor where keep it. It’s up here on some hook..and…smells different.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: It’s clean.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well, it feels different.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: It’s dry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, I can make my peace with the clean dry towels…Also what is with these chips you bought?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: No no no no, it’s potpourri. You’re supposed to smell it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well that’s like summer in a bowl.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Kim, Hi.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Uhh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you know, I…I handed in that marketing report and I never got to hear what you thought.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: I didn’t read it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahh….So…Wow…The spring line, it’s really going to be great this year, huh?

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So I hear the Ralph Lauren fooled around with someone in the copy room.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Tell me everything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know…Oh My God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What happened to your teeth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I whitened them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. What do you think.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I think I shouldn’t look directly at them.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, seriously.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross they’re really, really, really white.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, what was wrong with your old…human teeth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahh, I-I did leave the gel on a little longer then it said to.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How much longer?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A-A day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross you know that tonight is your date with Hillary?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know. That’s why I did it. Come on, are they really that bad?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no no no. You’ll be fine. Hillary’s bind, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She will be after tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hey, hey Rach, do you notice anything..ahh…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Your teeth? Yes, I saw them from outside. You guys are never going to believe this. But, Phoebe made out with Ralph Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What???

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my god.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah I know. She ran into him at my office and they just…made out. And the craziest thing is, now my boss likes me because I told her about it and she said it was the best gossip she’d heard all year.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am proud of all my friends today.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: My God, Rachel, I can’t believe Phoebe made out with Ralph Lauren. Ohh, I’m so jealous.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, I’m Chandler. Your live-in boy

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, please, come on. Look at him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I am no women, but that is one tasty dish.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey. Here. Ohh, who’s the silver fox?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That-that is your make out buddy. Don’t you recognize him? Oh wait. Ohh, Phoebe I love you. Kiss me please.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s not Ralph Lauren. Sounds like him though.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, no, Ralph doesn’t look anything like that guy. He’s-he’s young and he’s got long hair and a beard and a hacky sack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh My God, Phoebe, that’s not Ralph Lauren. That’s Kenny the copy guy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh..Go..Oh..and I told my boss that someone made out with Ralph Lauren. If she finds out that I lied to her, she is going to hate me even more. Phoebe!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why would the copy guy say he was Ralph Lauren?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: To get you to make out with him!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, maybe this will make your teeth look less white. Nope. Okay, colors that don’t work are blue, yellow, green, red, black, white, orange, and purple.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know what I’m going to do. That date starts in like an hour.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Ross, maybe if your skin was lighter. Your teeth wouldn’t look so bright.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh great. So all I need to do is get some new skin. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m just saying, if we put just a little bit of makeup on you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa. Whoa. Whoa. We’re not 13 anymore.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross this is the only thing left that has a shot at working.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But, won’t she notice I have makeup on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please. Half the guys out there have makeup on.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What??

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, half the people. I mean, just try it and see.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. I am not putting on makeup.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello. Oh good. Ross could you put up some of these flyers for me? OH!! Demon!! Demon!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now are drawers will smell nice and we didn’t waste these pantyhose.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, God forbid we throw out old underwear. You-you know what? I’m going to go over to Joey’s.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, we’re supposed to organize the wrapping paper drawer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but I feel like I’ve really gotten in touch with my feminine side enough today. You know. In fact I think we’re two sachets away from becoming a lesbian couple.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what? This has been kind of a girlie day. You’re right, I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nah, Nah, it’s okay. I feel like I need to be in guy place. You know, do kind of like a man thing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. Go over to Joey’s. Go over to Joey’s and drink some beer and hammer up some drywall.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know when guys hang out they don’t just drink some beer and hammer up drywall?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When girls hang out, we don’t have pillow fights in our underwear. I’m sorry. We do. We do. I don’t know why I said that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Chandler. Come on in. We’re knitting pot holders.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No thanks, Josephine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Ross, I was wondering if… Oh my God!! Where are all the men???

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, hi, Kim.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Hi Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, remember that thing I told you that happened yesterday? Well it didn’t happen.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: You didn’t cancel the fabric order from Taiwan?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, two things didn’t happen. Remember I told you that someone made out with Ralph Lauren in the copy room? Well, it turns out that’s not true.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: That’s not true?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh that’s interesting? Because I checked and only one keycard was used to access the copy machine yesterday during lunch and that keycard belonged to you, Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, no, no. Oh God, you think I made out with him.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Listen to me. If you think sleeping with Ralph is going to get you my job. You are sadly mistaken.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I don’t want your job. I-I don’t. Ohh this is such a mistake. I did not make out with him. Nobody made out with him. I did not use my keycard yesterday. I don’t even know how to use my keycard.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Hi Ralph.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Yeah, nothing happen. You could cut the sexual tension in here with a knife.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: And after that, what could I do except become a chef.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mmm-Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: And someday soon, I hope to open my own restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: You know, you’re a really great listener. Most guys I go out with, they just talk and talk.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mm-Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: After a while it’s like, shut your mouth, you know?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm-Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: I’ve probably been talking too much. Why don’t we talk about you a little bit?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mmm-Unmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Come on. I want to know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm-Hmm-Hmm. Okay. I, uh, am from Long Island. I-I came to the city for college. Um, I, um, have a 5 year old son and in my spare time I like to read spy novels. But, but, let’s talk more about you. Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what’s really neat. If you sear the stems of the flowers first in a frying pan, your arrangement will look fresh much longer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, Joey, that is such a great tip.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica, could you excuse us for a second? I need to talk to the girl with the flowers.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Oh but Joey, come over later because I’m going to teach you to make a bird feeder out of just a pine cone and some peanut butter.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, I love birds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What is the matter with you ?!?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re arranging flowers! You got dead flowers! You got a picture, a picture, of a baby dressed like flowers! This is not Joey!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. Hey look I am still Joey, okay. Flowers they’re just, you know, they’re nice to look at. And that happens to be a picture by a famous artist. Of a famous baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re turning into a women.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No I’m not. Why would you say that? That’s just mean.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now I’ve upset you? What did I say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s not what you said. It’s the way you said it….Oh My God, I’m a women!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now, she thinks that I made out with him and I did it to get her job.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But why didn’t you just tell her the truth.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did but she doesn’t think anyone would be stupid enough to confuse Kenny the copy guy with Ralph Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, hey, what if Kenny were the real brains behind the whole company? You know. What if Kenny hired that Ralph Lauren guy to be the pretty front man? Huh, did she ever think of that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You were with Kenny today, weren’t you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just for a second.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, Phoebe, what am I going to do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, the only thing you can do. Sleep with Ralph Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not going to sleep with Ralph Lauren. I mean, I could, but I wouldn’t.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, sleep with Kenny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That wouldn’t help me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, yes it would.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: I’ve had a really good time tonight.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: You know, I rarely connect with someone this much on the first date.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm-Hmm-Hmm. Me, neither. I’ve had a really good time too, you know.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Are you going to eat that bread?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, I just like the smell. Mmmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: You make me laugh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm-Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Would you like to move over to the couch?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mmm-Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Maybe I’ll just turn the lights down a little.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How about all the way.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, cool poster. Or should I say groovy poster? So, ahh, where were we?

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Are those your teeth??

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, you can see them, huh?

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: Yes. They’re insanely white.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I-I, did that for you.

utterance.speaker: Hillary
utterance.content: What’s a matter with you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s a matter with me? You’ve got a black light. It’s 1999!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Kim, hi.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Hi Rachel. Ohh, I’ve been meaning to ask you. Have you seen the new Ralph Lauren sheets? Ohh, what am I thinking. Of course you have.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay..Okay.. Look. I’m sorry that I lied to you before. You were right. Ralph and I were an item but were not anymore.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh, really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, he dumped me. He said, "Rachel, I can’t do this. Even though you are a very, very, very beautiful women. I can’t do this. I’m married and I’m sorry." And then I don’t know why but he said, "and you will never get promoted. Especially not above Kim, who is an integral cog in the Ralph Lauren machine."

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: You expect me to believe.. Hi Ralph.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh my God. He just gave you the coldest look I have ever seen. It’s like he hates you. Then it is true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course it’s true and it hurts so bad.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Ohh honey come here. Ohh it will be ok. We’ve all been there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You and Ralph?

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Kenny the copyboy.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, uhh, I need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: What’s the matter? Are you upset?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sorry but we’ve got to get rid of all this girlie stuff in here. I, uh, I got to be a man! Okay. The living room has to remain a guy place, okay? That’s just the way it has to be.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well, if that’s what you want. I’ll just put it all in my room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great…Great…and thanks for being so understanding. I mean, I didn’t want to make a big deal out of this, you know. You could, uh, put the picture of the famous baby in my room. I mean, if you want to.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And, uhh, maybe the watering can there.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And a couple of these little tiny boxes.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Joey? Do you want me to put it all in your room?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.
